Sea freight is crashing. I called this in April. Of course it's crashing. Retailers were fighting each other to get their inventory from China to capture the stimulated consumer flush with cash (see savings rate). This sent spot rates flying
created_at: along with crammed ports and super high shipping costs = inflationary costs passed onto the flush consumer who can take it.
